title: Structured data comparison
name: LGF_CompareVariant
description: The function compares two structured actual parameters and outputs whether they are of the same type and have the same values.

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

in/out.name: variableA
in/out.description: First comparison variable with any data type

in/out.name: variableB
in/out.description: Second comparison variable with any data type

return_value.description: FALSE: Values of comparison variables or PLC data types are different. TRUE: Values of the comparison variables are equal and PLC data types are identical.

description_zh: 该函数用于比较两个结构化的变量，并输出它们是否具有相同的数据类型和相同的值。函数首先检查两个变量的数据类型是否相同，然后将其序列化为字节数组，并比较数组的大小。如果大小相同，函数将逐字节比较字节数组中的值。如果所有值都相同，函数返回真（TRUE），表示两个变量具有相同的数据类型和相同的值；如果有任何值不同，函数返回假（FALSE）。如果输入变量的数据类型不相同或大小不同，函数将返回错误状态。函数支持的最大序列化长度为200字节。
